Title: HRM System MVVM sample code
Description: This is the sample WPF MVVM application that i've described in my blog posts. I hope to give you a clear view of mvvm and other commonly used patterns.

Project Description
This is the sample WPF MVVM application that i've described in my blog posts. I hope to give you a clear view of mvvm and other commonly used patterns.

See http://www.wpfdevelopment.com/post/2011/05/08/Building-a-HRM-system-Introduction-post.aspx for the starting post with information or check out my blog http://www.eriklieben.com
